query.postgres: create table {0} (BusinessUnit citext, AeraType citext, Division citext, Region citext, Cluster citext, Cod citext, CountEmployeeOnDepartment integer, CountEmployeeAgreedToEDM integer, PercentEmployeeAgreedToEDM integer, CountEmployeeToValidSignature integer, PercentEmployeeToValidSignature integer, ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL)

query.default: select * from ClassModule_Reports_ConnectedDepartmentOnEDM where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by BusinessUnit desc
